text.930: puḍhavi bhittiṃ silaṃ leluṃ | neva bhinde na saṃlihe /
text.932: suddha-puḍhavīe na nisie | sasarakkhammi ya āsaṇe /
text.934: sīodagaṃ na sevejjā | silā-vuṭhaṃ himāṇi ya /
text.936: udaollaṃ appaṇo kāyaṃ | neva puñche na saṃlihe /
text.938: iṅgālaṃ agaṇiṃ acciṃ | alāyaṃ vā sa-joiyaṃ /
text.939: na uñjejjā na ghaejjā | no -aṃ nivvāvae muṇī
text.941: na vīejja appaṇo kāyaṃ | bāhiraṃ vā vi poggalaṃ
text.942: taṇa-rukkhaṃ na chindejjā | phalaṃ mūlaṃ va kassaī /
text.943: āmagaṃ vivihaṃ bīyaṃ | maṇasā vi na patthae
text.944: gahaṇesu na ciṭhejjā | bīesu hariesu vā /
text.946: tase pāṇe na hiṃsejjā | vāyā aduva kammuṇā /
text.948: aṭha suhumāi pehāe | jāiṃ jāṇittu saṃjae /
text.949: dayāhigārī bhūesu | āsa ciṭha saehi vā
text.950: kayarāi aṭha suhumāiṃ | jāiṃ pucchejja saṃjae? /
text.952: siṇehaṃ puppha-suhumaṃ ca | pāṇuttiṅgaṃ taheva ya /
text.953: paṇagaṃ bīya hariyaṃ ca | aṇḍa-suhumaṃ ca aṭhamaṃ
text.961: jayaṃ ciṭhe, miyaṃ bhāse, | na ya rūvesu maṇaṃ kare
text.962: bahuṃ suṇei kaṇṇehiṃ, | bahuṃ acchīhi pecchaī, /
text.963: na ya diṭhaṃ suyaṃ savvaṃ | bhikkhū akkhāumarihaī
text.964: suyaṃ vā jai vā diṭhaṃ | na lavejjovaghāiyaṃ /
text.965: na ya keṇai uvāeṇaṃ | gihi-jogaṃ samāyare
text.966: niṭhāṇaṃ rasa-nijjūḍhaṃ | bhaddagaṃ pāvagaṃ ti vā /
text.967: puṭho vā vi apuṭho vā | lābhālābhaṃ na niddise
text.968: na ya bhoyaṇammi giddho | care uñchaṃ ayampiro /
text.970: sannihiṃ ca na kuvvejjā | aṇu-māyaṃ pi saṃjae /
text.976: khuhaṃ pivāsa dussejjaṃ | sīuṇhaṃ araī bhayaṃ /
text.979: āhāramaiyaṃ savvaṃ | maṇasā vi na patthae
text.981: havejja uyare dante, | thovaṃ laddhuṃ na khiṃsae
text.982: na bāhiraṃ paribhave, | attāṇaṃ na samukkase, /
text.983: suya-lābhe na majjejjā | jaccā tavasi buddhie
text.984: se jāṇaṃ ajāṇaṃ vā | kau āhammiyaṃ payaṃ /
text.985: saṃvare khippamappāṇaṃ, | bīyaṃ taṃ na samāyare
text.986: aṇāyāraṃ parakkamma | neva gūhe, na niṇhave /
text.993: (khettaṃ kālaṃ ca vinnāya | tahappāṇaṃ na juñjae || ||)
text.994: jarā jāva na pīlei | vāhī jāva na vaḍḍhaī /
text.995: jāvindiyā na hāyanti | tāva dhammaṃ samāyare
text.996: kohaṃ māṇaṃ ca māyaṃ ca | lobhaṃ ca pāva-vaḍḍhaṇaṃ /
text.997: vame cattāri dose u | icchanto hiyamappaṇo
text.1000: uvasameṇa haṇe kohaṃ, | māṇaṃ maddavayā jiṇe /
text.1002: koho ya māṇo ya aṇiggahīyā | māyā ya lobho ya pavaḍḍhamāṇā /
text.1003: cattāri ee kasiṇā kasāyā | siñcanti mūlāi puṇabbhavassa
text.1004: rāiṇiesu viṇayaṃ pauñje, | dhuva-sīlayaṃ sayayaṃ hāvaejjā /
text.1006: niddaṃ ca na bahu-mannejjā, | sa-ppahāsaṃ vivajjae /
text.1007: miho-kahāhiṃ na rame | sajjhāyammi rao sayā
text.1008: jogaṃ ca samaṇa-dhammammi | juñje aṇalaso dhuvaṃ /
text.1009: jutto ya samaṇa-dhammammi | aṭhaṃ lahai aṇuttaraṃ
text.1012: hatthaṃ pāyaṃ ca kāyaṃ ca | paṇihāya jiindie /
text.1014: na pakkhao na purao | neva kiccāṇa piṭhao /
text.1015: na ya ūruṃ samāsejjā | ciṭhejjā guruṇantie
text.1018: appattiyaṃ jeṇa siyā | āsu kuppejja vā paro /
text.1019: savvaso taṃ na bhāsejjā | bhāsaṃ ahiya-gāmiṇiṃ
text.1023: vai-vikkhaliyaṃ naccā | na taṃ uvahase muṇī
text.1025: gihiṇo taṃ na āikkhe | bhūyāhigaraṇaṃ payaṃ
text.1028: vivittā ya bhave sejjā, | nārīṇaṃ na lave kahaṃ /
text.1029: gihi-saṃthavaṃ na kujjā, | kujjā sāhūhi saṃthavaṃ
text.1032: citta-bhittiṃ na nijjhāe | nāriṃ vā suṇalaṃkiyaṃ, /
text.1041: aṇiccaṃ tesi vinnāya | pariṇāmaṃ poggalāṇa u
text.1042: poggalāṇa parīṇāmaṃ | tesiṃ naccā jahā tahāũ/
text.1046: tavaṃ cimaṃ saṃjama-jogayaṃ ca | sajjhāya-jogaṃ ca sayā ahiṭhae /
text.1047: sūre va seṇāe samatta-māuhe | alamappaṇo hoi alaṃ paresiṃ
text.1049: visujjhaī jaṃ se malaṃ pure-kaḍaṃ | samīriyaṃ ruppa-malaṃ va joiṇā
text.1050: se tārise dukkha-sahe jiindie | sueṇa jutte amame akiṃcaṇe /
text.1051: virāyaī kamma-ghaṇammi avagae | kasiṇabbha-puḍāvagame va candima  tti bemi
text.1055: thambhā va kohā va maya-ppamāyā | gurussagāse viṇayaṃ na sikkhe /
text.1056: so ceva o tassa abhūi-bhāvo, | phalaṃ va kīyassa vahāya hoi
text.1057: je yāvi manda tti guruṃ viittā | ḍahare ime appa-sue tti naccā /
text.1058: hīlanti micchaṃ paḍivajjamāṇā | karenti āsāyaṇa te gurūṇaṃ
text.1059: pagaīe mandā vi bhavanti ege | ḍaharā vi ya je suya-buddhovaveyā /
text.1060: āyāramantā guṇa suṭhiyappā | je hīliyā sihiriva bhāsa kujjā
text.1061: je yāvi nāgaṃ ḍaharaṃ ti naccā | āsāyae se ahiyāya hoi /
text.1062: evāyariyaṃ pi hu hīlayanto | niyacchaī jāi-pahaṃ khu mande
text.1063: āsīviso yāvi paraṃ su-ruṭho | kiṃ jīva-nāsāo paraṃ nu kujjā? /
text.1064: āyariya-pāyā puṇa appasannā, | abohiṇāsāyaṇa natthi mokkho
text.1065: jo pāvagaṃ jaliyamavakkamejjā | āsīvisaṃ vā vi hu kovaejjā /
text.1066: jo vā visaṃ khāyai jīviyaṭhī | esovamāsāyaṇayā gurūṇaṃ
text.1067: siyā hu se pāvaya no ḍahejjā, | āsīviso vā kuvio na bhakkhe /
text.1068: siyā visaṃ hālahalaṃ na māre, | na yāvi mokkho guru-hīlaṇāe
text.1069: jo pavvayaṃ sirasā bhettumicche | suttaṃ va sīhaṃ paḍibohaejjā /
text.1070: jo vā dae sattiṇagge pahāraṃ | esovamāsāyaṇayā gurūṇaṃ
text.1071: siyā hu sīseṇa giriṃ pi bhinde | siyā hu sīho kuvio na bhakkhe /
text.1072: siyā na bhindejja va sattiṇaggaṃ | na yāvi mokkho guru-hīlaṇāe
text.1073: āyariya pāyā puṇa appasannā, | ābohiṇāsāsaṇa natthi mokkho /
text.1077: jassantie dhamma-payāi sikkhe | tassantie viṇaiyaṃ pauñje /
text.1078: sakkārae sirasā pañjalīo | kāya-ggirā "bho" maṇasā ya niccaṃ
text.1079: lajjā dayā saṃjama bambhaceraṃ | kallāṇa-bhāgissa visohiṇṭhāṇaṃ /
text.1080: je me gurū sayayamaṇusāsayanti | te haṃ gurū sayayaṃ pūyayāmi
text.1081: jahā nisante tavaṇaccimālī | pabhāsaī kevala-bhārahaṃ tu /
text.1082: evāyario suya-sīla-buddhie | virāyaī sura-majjhe va indo
text.1084: khe sohaī vimale abbha-mukke, | evaṃ gaṇī sohai bhikkhu-majjhe
text.1088: ārāhaittāṇa guṇe aṇege | se pāvaī siddhimaṇuttaraṃ ti  bemi ||
text.1091: mūlāo khandha-ppabhavo dumassa, | khandhāo pacchā samuventi sāhā /
text.1092: sāha-ppasāhā viruhanti pattā, | tao se pupphaṃ ca phalaṃ raso ya
text.1093: evaṃ dhammassa viṇao | mūlaṃ, paramo se mokkho /
text.1094: jeṇa kittiṃ suyaṃ sagghaṃ | nissesaṃ cābhigacchaī
text.1095: je ya caṇḍe mie thaddhe | duvvāī niyaḍī saḍhe /
text.1096: vujjhaī se aviṇīyappā | kaṭhaṃ soya-gayaṃ jahā
text.1097: viṇayaṃ pi jo uvāeṇa | coio kuppaī naro /
text.1109: taheva aviṇīyappā | devā jakkhā ya gujjhagā /
text.1111: taheva suviṇīyappā | devā jakkhā ya gujjhagā /
text.1114: tesiṃ sikkhā pavaḍḍhanti | jala-sittā iva pāyavā
text.1115: appaṇaṭhā paraṭhā vā | sippā neuṇiyāṇi ya /
text.1117: jeṇa bandhaṃ vahaṃ ghoraṃ | pariyāvaṃ ca dāruṇaṃ /
text.1119: te vi taṃ guruṃ pūyanti | tassa sippassa kāraṇā /
text.1122: āyariyā jaṃ vae bhikkhū | tamhā taṃ nāivattae
text.1123: nīyaṃ sejjaṃ gaiṃ ṭhāṇaṃ, | nīyaṃ ca āsaṇāṇi ya, /
text.1124: nīyaṃ ca pāe vandejjā, | nīyaṃ kujjā ya añjaliṃ
text.1126: "khameha avarāhaṃ me" | vaejja "na puṇo" tti ya
text.1127: duggao vā paoeṇaṃ | coio vahaī rahaṃ, /
text.1128: evaṃ dubuddhi kiccāṇaṃ | vutto vutto pakuvvaī
text.1132: teṇaṃ teṇaṃ uvāehiṃ | taṃ taṃ saṃpaḍivāyae
text.1134: jasseyaṃ duhao nāyaṃ | sikkhaṃ se abhigacchaī
text.1135: je yāvi caṇḍe maiṇiḍḍhi-gārave | pisuṇe nare sāhasa hīṇa-pesaṇe /
text.1136: adiṭha-dhamme viṇae akovie | asaṃvibhāgī na hu tassa mokkho
text.1137: niddesa-vattī puṇa je gurūṇaṃ | suyattha-dhammā viṇayammi koviyā /
text.1138: tarittu te ohamiṇaṃ duruttaraṃ | khavittu kammaṃ gaimuttamaṃ gaya  tti bemi ||
text.1142: āloiyaṃ iṅgiyameva naccā | jo chandamārāhayaī sa pujjo
text.1143: āyāra-maṭhā viṇayaṃ pauñje | sussūsamāṇo parigijjha vakkaṃ /
text.1144: jahovaiṭhaṃ abhikaṅkhamāṇo | guruṃ tu nāsāyayaī, sa pujjo
text.1145: rāiṇiesu viṇayaṃ pauñje | ḍaharā vi ya je pariyāya-jeṭhā /
text.1146: niyattaṇe vaai sacca-vāī | ovāyavaṃ vakka-kare, sa pujjo
text.1147: annāyaṇuñchaṃ caraī visuddhaṃ | javaṇaṭhayā samuyāṇaṃ ca niccaṃ /
text.1148: aladdhuyaṃ no paridevaejjā, | laddhuṃ na vikaṃthayaī, sa pujjo
text.1150: jo evamappāṇabhitosaejjā | saṃtosa-pāhanna rae sa pujjo
text.1151: sakkā saheuṃ āsāe ka- ayā | aomayā ucchahayā nareṇaṃ /
text.1152: aṇāsae jo u sahejja ka- e | vaīmae kaṇṇa-sare sa pujjo
text.1153: muhutta-dukkhā u havanti ka- ayā | aomayā, te vi tao suṇuddharā /
text.1156: dhammo tti kiccā paramagga-sūre | jiindie jo sahaī sa pujjo
text.1157: avaṇṇa-vāyaṃ ca parammuhassa | paccakkhao paḍiṇīyaṃ ca bhāsaṃ /
text.1158: ohāriṇiṃ appiyakāriṇiṃ ca | bhāsaṃ na bhāsejja sayā, sa pujjo
text.1159: alolue akkuhae amāī | apisuṇe yāvi adīṇa-vittī /
text.1160: no bhāvae no vi ya bhāviyappā | akouhalle ya sayā sa pujjo
text.1161: guṇehi sāhū, aguṇehi 'sāhū, | geṇhāhi sāhū-guṇa, muñcasāhū /
text.1162: viyāṇiyā appagamappaeṇaṃ | jo rāga-dosehi samo sa pujjo
text.1163: taheva ḍaharaṃ va mahallagaṃ vā | itthī pumaṃ pavvaiyaṃ gihiṃ vā /
text.1164: no hīlae no vi ya khiṃsaejjā, | thambhaṃ ca kohaṃ ca cae, sa pujjo
text.1165: je māṇiyā sayayaṃ māṇayanti | jatteṇa kannaṃ va nivesayanti /
text.1166: te māṇae māṇarihe tavassī | jiindie sacca-rae, sa pujjo
text.1167: tesiṃ gurūṇaṃ guṇasāgarāṇaṃ | soccāṇa mehāvi subhāsiyāiṃ /
text.1168: care muṇī pañcarae tigutto | caukkasāyāvagae, sa pujjo
text.1169: gurumiha sayayaṃ paḍiyariya muṇī | jiṇa-vaya-niuṇe abhigama-kusale /
text.1170: dhuṇiya raya-malaṃ pure-kaḍaṃ | bhāsuramaulaṃ gaiṃ gaya  tti bemi ||
text.1173: suyaṃ me āusaṃ teṇaṃ bhagavayā evamakkhāyaṃ | iha
text.1175: pannattā || kayare khalu te therehiṃ bhagavantehiṃ cattāri
text.1176: viṇaya-samāhiṭhāṇā pannattā? ime khalu te therehiṃ bhagavantehiṃ
text.1179: viṇae sue tave ya | āyāre niccaṃ paṇḍiyā /
text.1181: cauvvihā khalu viṇaya-samāhī bhavai, taṃ jahā | aṇusāsijjanto
text.1183: na ya bhavai atta-saṃpaggahie cautthaṃ payaṃ
text.1185: pehei hiyāṇusāsaṇaṃ, | sussūsaī, taṃ ca puṇo ahiṭhae /
text.1186: na ya māṇa-maeṇa majjai | viṇaya-samāhī āyayaṭhie
text.1187: cauvvihā khalu suya-samāhī bhavai, taṃ jahā
text.1188: suyaṃ me bhavissai tti ajjhāiyavvaṃ bhavai, egaggacitto
text.1190: ṭhāvaissāmi tti ajjhāiyavvaṃ bhavai, ṭhio paraṃ
text.1191: ṭhāvaissāmi tti ajjhāiyavvaṃ bhavai cautthaṃ payaṃ
text.1195: cauvvihā khalu tava-samāhī bhavai, taṃ jahā | no
text.1199: payaṃ bhavai  bhavai ya ettha silogo
text.1200: viviha-guṇa-tavo-rae ya niccaṃ | bhavai nirāsae nijjaraṭhie /
text.1201: tavasā dhuṇai purāṇa-pāvagaṃ | jutto sayā tava-samāhie
text.1202: cauvvihā khalu āyāra-samāhī bhavai, taṃ jahā
text.1212: jāi-maraṇāo muccaī | itthatthaṃ ca cayai savvaso /
text.1213: siddhe vā bhavai sāsae | devo vā appa-rae mahiḍḍhie   tti bemi ||
text.1217: itthīṇa vasaṃ na yāvi gacche | vantaṃ no paḍiyāyaī je sa bhikkhū
text.1218: puḍhaviṃ na khaṇe na khaṇāvae, | sīodagaṃ na pie na piyāvae /
text.1219: agaṇi satthaṃ jahā su-nisiyaṃ | taṃ na jale na jalāvae je sa bhikkhū
text.1220: anileṇa na vīe na vīyāvae, | hariyāṇi na chinde na chindāvae /
text.1221: bīyāṇi sayā vivajjayanto | saccittaṃ nāhārae je sa bhikkhū
text.1223: tamhā uddesiyaṃ na bhuñje, | no vi pae na payāvae je sa bhikkhū
text.1225: pañca ya phāse mahavvayāiṃ | pañcāsava-saṃvarae je sa bhikkhū
text.1226: cattāri vame sayā kasāe | dhuva-jogī ya havejja buddha-vayaṇe /
text.1227: ahaṇe nijjāya-rūva-rayae | gihi-jogaṃ parivajjae je sa bhikkhū
text.1228: sammaddiṭhī sayā amūḍhe | "atthi hu nāṇe tave saṃjame ya" /
text.1229: tavasā dhuṇai purāṇa-pāvagaṃ | maṇa-vaya-kāya-susaṃvuḍe je sa bhikkhū
text.1230: taheva asaṇaṃ pāṇagaṃ vā | vivihaṃ khāima-sāimaṃ labhittā /
text.1231: "hohī aṭho sue pare vā" | taṃ na nihe na nihāvae je sa bhikkhū
text.1232: taheva asaṇaṃ pāṇagaṃ vā | vivihaṃ khāima-sāimaṃ labhittā /
text.1233: chandiya sāhammiyāṇa bhuñje | bhoccā sajjhāya-rae ya je sa bhikkhū
text.1234: na ya vuggahiyaṃ kahaṃ kahejjā | na ya kuppe nihuindie pasante /
text.1235: saṃjama-dhuva-joga-jutte | uvasante aviheḍae je sa bhikkhū
text.1236: jo sahai hu gāma-ka- ae | akkosa-pahāra-tajjaṇāo ya /
text.1237: bhaya-bherava-sadda sa-ppahāse | sama-suha-dukkha-sahe ya je sa bhikkhū
text.1238: paḍimaṃ paḍivajjiyā masāṇe | no bhāe bhaya-bheravāi dissa /
text.1239: viviha-guṇa-tavo-rae ya niccaṃ | na sarīraṃ cābhikaṅkhaī je sa bhikkhū
text.1240: asaiṃ vosaṭha-catta-dehe | akkuṭhe va hae va lūsie vā /
text.1241: puḍhavi-same muṇī havejjā | aniyāṇe akohalle ya je sa bhikkhū
text.1242: abhibhūya kāeṇa parīsahāiṃ | samuddhare jāi-pahāo appayaṃ /
text.1243: viittu jāī-maraṇaṃ mahabbhayaṃ | tave rae sāmaṇie je sa bhikkhū
text.1245: ajjhappa-rae susamāhiyappā | suttatthaṃ ca viyāṇaī je sa bhikkhū
text.1247: kaya-vikkaya-sannihiā virae | savva-saṅgāvagae ya je sa bhikkhū
text.1248: alolo bhikkhū na rasesu giddhe | uñchaṃ care jīviya-nābhikaṅkhī /
text.1249: iḍḍhiṃ ca sakkāraṇa pūyaṇaṃ ca | cae ṭhiyappā aṇihe je sa bhikkhū
text.1250: na paraṃ vaejjāsi "ayaṃ kusīle" | jeṇanno kuppejja na taṃ vaejjā /
text.1251: jāṇiya patteya puṇṇa-pāvaṃ | attāṇaṃ na samukkase je sa bhikkhū
text.1252: na jāi-matte na ya rūva-matte | na lābha-matte na sueṇa matte /
text.1253: mayāṇi savvāṇi vivajjayanto | dhamma-jjhāṇa-rae ya je sa bhikkhū
text.1254: paveyae ajja-payaṃ mahā-muṇī, | dhamme ṭhio ṭhāvayaī paraṃ pi /
text.1255: nikkhamma vajjejja kusīla-liṅgaṃ | na yāvi hāsaṃ kahae je sa bhikkhū
text.1256: taṃ deha-vāsaṃ asuiṃ asāsayaṃ | sayā cae nicca-hiyaṇṭhiyappā /
text.1257: chindittu jāī-maraṇassa bandhaṇaṃ | uvei bhikkhū apuṇāgamaṃ gaiṃ  ti bemi ||
text.1260: iha khalu bho pavvaieṇaṃ uppanna-dukkheṇaṃ saṃjame
text.1263: aṭhārasa ṭhāṇāiṃ sammaṃ saṃpaḍilehiyavvāiṃ bhavanti, taṃ
text.1268: imaṃ ca me dukkhaṃ na cirakālovaṭhāi bhavissai
text.1272: dullabhe khalu bho gihīṇaṃ dhamme gihi-vāsa-majjhe vasantāṇaṃ
text.1280: aṇicce khalu bho maṇuyāṇa jīvie kusaggajala-bindu-cañcale
text.1281: bahuṃ ca khalu pāvaṃ kammaṃ pagaḍaṃ
text.1282: pāvāṇaṃ ca khalu bho kaḍāṇaṃ kammāṇaṃ puvviṃ
text.1284: aveyaittā, tavasā vā jhosaittā | aṭhārasamaṃ payaṃ
text.1286: jayā ya cayaī dhammaṃ | aṇajjo bhoga-kāraṇā /
text.1287: se tattha mucchie bāle | āyaiṃ nāvabujjhaī
text.1288: jayā ohāvio hoi | indo vā paḍio chamaṃ /
text.1290: jayā ya vandimo hoi | pacchā hoi avandimo /
text.1291: devayā va ccuyā ṭhāṇā | sa pacchā paritappaī
text.1292: jayā ya pūimo hoi | pacchā hoi apūimo /
text.1293: rāyā va rajja-pabbhaṭho | sa pacchā paritappaī
text.1294: jayā ya māṇimo hoi | pacchā hoi amāṇimo /
text.1295: seṭhi vva kabbaḍe chūḍho | sa pacchā paritappaī
text.1297: maccho vva galiṃ gilittā | sa pacchā paritappaī
text.1299: (hatthī va bandhaṇe baddho | sa pacchā paritappaī ||)
text.1301: paṅkosanno jahā nāgo | sa pacchā paritappaī
text.1303: jai haṃ ramanto pariyāe | sāmaṇṇe jiṇa-desie"
text.1306: amarovamaṃ jāṇiya sokkhamuttamaṃ | rayāṇa pariyāe, tahārayāṇaṃ /
text.1307: niraovamaṃ jāṇiya dukkhamuttamaṃ | ramejja tamhā pariyāya paṇḍie
text.1309: hīlanti -aṃ duvvihiyaṃ kusīlā | dāḍhuddhiyaṃ ghora-visaṃ va nāgaṃ
text.1310: ihevadhammo ayaso akittī | dunnāmadhejjaṃ ca pihujjaṇammi /
text.1311: cuyassa dhammāo ahamma-seviṇo | saṃbhinna-vittassa ya heṭhao gaī
text.1312: bhuñjittu bhogāi pasajjha ceyasā | tahāvihaṃ kau asaṃjamaṃ bahuṃ /
text.1313: gaiṃ ca gacche aṇabhijjhiyaṃ duhaṃ, | bohī ya se no sulabhā puṇo puṇo
text.1315: paliovamaṃ jhijjai sāgarovamaṃ, | kimaṅga puṇa majjha imaṃ maṇo-duhaṃ!
text.1316: na me ciraṃ dukkhamiṇaṃ bhavissaī, | asāsayā bhoga-pivāsa jantuṇo /
text.1317: na ce sarīreṇa imeṇavessaī, | avesaī jīviya-pajjaveṇa me"
text.1318: jassevamappā u havejja nicchio | caejja dehaṃ, na u dhamma-sāsaṇaṃ /
text.1319: taṃ tārisaṃ no payalenti indiyā | uvanta-vāyā va sudaṃsaṇaṃ giriṃ
text.1320: icceva saṃpassiya buddhimaṃ naro | āyaṃ uvāyaṃ vivihaṃ viyāṇiyā /
text.1321: kāeṇa vāyā adu māṇaseṇaṃ | tigutti-gutto jiṇa-vayaṇamahiṭhejjāsi  tti bemi ||
text.1325: jaṃ suṇittu sa-puṇṇāṇaṃ | dhamme uppajjae maī
text.1331: cariyā guṇā ya niyamā ya | honti sāhūṇa daṭhavvā
text.1333: appovahī kalaha-vivajjaṇā ya | vihāra-cariyā isiṇaṃ pasatthā
text.1335: saṃsaṭha-kappeṇa carejja bhikkhū | tajjāya-saṃsaṭha jaī jaejjā
text.1338: na paḍinnavejjā sayaṇāsaṇāiṃ | sejjaṃ nisejjaṃ taha bhatta-pāṇaṃ /
text.1339: gāme kule vā nagare va dese | mamatta-bhāvaṃ na kahiṃci kujjā
text.1340: gihiṇo veyāvaḍiyaṃ na kujjā | abhivāyaṇaṃ vandaṇa pūyaṇaṃ vā /
text.1341: asaṃkiliṭhehi samaṃ vasejjā | muṇī carittassa jao na hāṇī
text.1342: na yā labhejjā niuṇaṃ sahāyaṃ | guṇāhiyaṃ vā guṇao samaṃ vā /
text.1343: ekko vi pāvāi vivajjayanto | viharejja kāmesu asajjamāṇo
text.1344: saṃvaccharaṃ cāvi paraṃ pamāṇaṃ, | bīyaṃ ca vāsaṃ na tahiṃ vasejjā /
text.1345: suttassa maggeṇa carejja bhikkhū | suttassa attho jaha āṇavei
text.1347: "kiṃ me kaḍaṃ? kiṃ ca me kicca-sesaṃ? | kiṃ sakkaṇijjaṃ na samāyarāmi?
text.1348: kiṃ me paro pāsai? kiṃ ca appā? | kiṃ cāhaṃ khaliyaṃ na vivajjayāmi?" /
text.1349: icceva sammaṃ aṇupāsamāṇo | aṇāgayaṃ no paḍibandha kujjā
text.1350: jattheva pāse kai duppauttaṃ | kāeṇa vāyā adu māṇaseṇaṃ /
text.1351: tattheva dhīro paḍisāharejjā | āinno khippamiva kkhalīṇaṃ
text.1352: jasserisā joga jiindiyassa | dhiīmao sappurisassa niccaṃ /
text.1354: appā hu khalu sayayaṃ rakkhiyavvo | savvindiehiṃ susamāhiehiṃ /
text.1355: arakkhio jāi-pahaṃ uvei, | surakkhio savva-duhāṇa muccai  tti bemi ||
